choose.when: SELECT bizes_id, bizes_nm, rdnm_adr, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, region_fk FROM convenience_store
SELECT bizes_id, bizes_nm, rdnm_adr, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates, region_fk FROM cafe

INSERT INTO convenience_pair (st_nm, st_coor, com_nm, com_coor, dist, region_fk) VALUES (#{pairData.st_nm}, ST_GeomFromText(#{pairData.st_coor}), #{pairData.com_nm}, ST_GeomFromText(#{pairData.com_coor}), #{pairData.dist}, #{pairData.region_fk})

INSERT INTO cafe_pair (st_nm, st_coor, com_nm, com_coor, dist, region_fk) VALUES (#{pairData.st_nm}, ST_GeomFromText(#{pairData.st_coor}), #{pairData.com_nm}, ST_GeomFromText(#{pairData.com_coor}), #{pairData.dist}, #{pairData.region_fk})

SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}), coordinates) AS dist, #{region} AS region_fk, #{name} AS st_nm, #{point} AS st_coor, bizes_nm AS com_nm, ST_AsWKT(coordinates) AS com_coor FROM convenience_store WHERE convenience_store.region_fk = #{region} AND ST_Within(coordinates, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}), 500)) AND ST_Distance_Sphere(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}), coordinates) > 10 ORDER BY dist LIMIT 1;

SELECT ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}), coordinates) AS dist, #{region} AS region_fk, #{name} AS st_nm, #{point} AS st_coor, bizes_nm AS com_nm, ST_AsWKT(coordinates) AS com_coor FROM cafe WHERE cafe.region_fk = #{region} AND ST_Contains(ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}), 300), coordinates) AND ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}), coordinates) > 10 ORDER BY dist LIMIT 1;
DELETE t1 FROM convenience_pair t1 JOIN convenience_pair t2 ON t1.st_nm = t2.com_nm AND t1.com_nm = t2.st_nm AND t1.pair_id > t2.pair_id;
DELETE t1 FROM cafe_pair t1 JOIN cafe_pair t2 ON t1.st_nm = t2.com_nm AND t1.com_nm = t2.st_nm AND t1.pair_id > t2.pair_id;
